006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import com.ctc.wstx.api.WstxOutputProperties;
009import com.ctc.wstx.stax.WstxOutputFactory;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
015
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.AstCollectingVisitor;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkFactory;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.IMarkupVisitor;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.IMarkupWriter;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.InsertAnchorExtension;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.InsertAnchorExtension.InsertAnchorNode;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.MarkupVisitor;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.MarkupXmlEventWriter;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.MarkupXmlStreamWriter;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
026
027import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
029import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLOutputFactory2;
030import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
031import org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2;
032import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
033import org.jsoup.nodes.TextNode;
034import org.jsoup.select.NodeTraversor;
035import org.jsoup.select.NodeVisitor;
036
037import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
040import java.util.List;
041import java.util.function.Predicate;
042import java.util.regex.Pattern;
043import java.util.stream.Stream;
044import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
045
046import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter;
047import javax.xml.stream.XMLOutputFactory;
048import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
049import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter;
050
051import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
052import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
053
054@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
055public abstract class AbstractMarkupString<TYPE extends AbstractMarkupString<TYPE>>
056    implements IMarkupString<TYPE> {
057  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(FlexmarkFactory.class);
058
059  private static final Pattern QUOTE_TAG_REPLACEMENT_PATTERN
060      = Pattern.compile("</?q>");
061
062  //
063  // @NonNull
064  // private static final String DEFAULT_HTML_NS = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml";
065  // @NonNull
066  // private static final String DEFAULT_HTML_PREFIX = "";
067
068  @NonNull
069  private final Document document;
070
071  /**
072   * Construct a new markup string based on the provided flexmark AST graph.
073   *
074   * @param document
075   *          the AST graph representing Markdown text
076   */
077  protected AbstractMarkupString(@NonNull Document document) {
078    this.document = document;
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  public Document getDocument() {
083    return document;
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  public boolean isEmpty() {
088    return getDocument().getFirstChild() == null;
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Parse HTML-based text into markdown as a flexmark AST graph.
093   * <p>
094   * This method uses a two-step approach that first translates the HTML into
095   * markdown, and then parses the markdown into an AST graph.
096   *
097   * @param html
098   *          the HTML text to parse
099   * @param htmlParser
100   *          the HTML parser used to produce markdown
101   * @param markdownParser
102   *          the markdown parser
103   * @return the markdown AST graph
104   */
105  @NonNull
106  protected static Document parseHtml(@NonNull String html, @NonNull FlexmarkHtmlConverter htmlParser,
107      @NonNull Parser markdownParser) {
108    org.jsoup.nodes.Document document = Jsoup.parse(html);
109
110    // Fix for usnistgov/liboscal-java#5
111    // Caused by not stripping out extra newlines inside HTML tags
112    NodeTraversor.traverse(new NodeVisitor() {
113
114      @Override
115      public void head(org.jsoup.nodes.Node node, int depth) {
116        if (node instanceof TextNode) {
117          TextNode textNode = (TextNode) node;
118
119          org.jsoup.nodes.Node parent = textNode.parent();
120
121          if (!isTag(parent, "code") || !isTag(parent.parent(), "pre")) {
122            node.replaceWith(new TextNode(textNode.text()));
123          }
124        }
125      }
126
127      private boolean isTag(@Nullable org.jsoup.nodes.Node node, @NonNull String tagName) {
128        return node != null && tagName.equals(node.normalName());
129      }
130
131    }, document);
132
133    String markdown = htmlParser.convert(document);
134    assert markdown != null;
135    if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
136      LOGGER.debug("html->markdown: {}", markdown);
137    }
138    return parseMarkdown(markdown, markdownParser);
139  }
140
141  /**
142   * Parse markdown-based text into a flexmark AST graph.
143   *
144   * @param markdown
145   *          the markdown text to parse
146   * @param parser
147   *          the markdown parser
148   * @return the markdown AST graph
149   */
150  @SuppressWarnings("null")
151  @NonNull
152  protected static Document parseMarkdown(@NonNull String markdown, @NonNull Parser parser) {
153    return parser.parse(markdown);
154  }
155
156  @Override
157  public String toXHtml(@NonNull String namespace) throws XMLStreamException, IOException {
158
159    String retval;
160
161    Document document = getDocument();
162    if (document.hasChildren()) {
163
164      XMLOutputFactory2 factory = (XMLOutputFactory2) XMLOutputFactory.newInstance();
165      assert factory instanceof WstxOutputFactory;
166      factory.setProperty(WstxOutputProperties.P_OUTPUT_VALIDATE_STRUCTURE, false);
167      try (ByteArrayOutputStream os = new ByteArrayOutputStream()) {
168        XMLStreamWriter2 xmlStreamWriter = (XMLStreamWriter2) factory.createXMLStreamWriter(os);
169
170        writeXHtml(namespace, ObjectUtils.notNull(xmlStreamWriter));
171
172        xmlStreamWriter.flush();
173        xmlStreamWriter.close();
174        os.flush();
175        retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(os.toString(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
176      }
177    } else {
178      retval = "";
179    }
180    return retval;
181  }
182
183  @Override
184  public String toHtml() {
185    // String html;
186    // try {
187    // html = toXHtml("");
188    // } catch(RuntimeException ex) {
189    // throw ex;
190    // } catch (Throwable ex) {
191    // throw new RuntimeException(ex);
192    // }
193    // return QUOTE_TAG_REPLACEMENT_PATTERN.matcher(html)
194    // .replaceAll("&quot;");
195    String html = getFlexmarkFactory().getHtmlRenderer().render(getDocument());
196    return ObjectUtils.notNull(QUOTE_TAG_REPLACEMENT_PATTERN.matcher(html)
197        .replaceAll("&quot;"));
198  }
199
200  @Override
201  public String toMarkdown() {
202    return toMarkdown(getFlexmarkFactory().getFormatter());
203  }
204
205  @Override
206  public String toMarkdown(Formatter formatter) {
207    return ObjectUtils.notNull(formatter.render(getDocument()));
208  }
209
210  @Override
211  public void writeXHtml(String namespace, XMLStreamWriter2 streamWriter) throws XMLStreamException {
212    Document document = getDocument();
213    if (document.hasChildren()) {
214      IMarkupWriter<XMLStreamWriter, XMLStreamException> writer = new MarkupXmlStreamWriter(
215          namespace,
216          getFlexmarkFactory().getListOptions(),
217          streamWriter);
218
219      IMarkupVisitor<XMLStreamWriter, XMLStreamException> visitor = new MarkupVisitor<>(isBlock());
220      visitor.visitDocument(document, writer);
221    } else {
222      streamWriter.writeCharacters("");
223    }
224  }
225
226  @Override
227  public void writeXHtml(String namespace, XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory, XMLEventWriter eventWriter)
228      throws XMLStreamException {
229    Document document = getDocument();
230    if (document.hasChildren()) {
231
232      IMarkupWriter<XMLEventWriter, XMLStreamException> writer = new MarkupXmlEventWriter(
233          namespace,
234          getFlexmarkFactory().getListOptions(),
235          eventWriter,
236          eventFactory);
237
238      IMarkupVisitor<XMLEventWriter, XMLStreamException> visitor = new MarkupVisitor<>(isBlock());
239      visitor.visitDocument(getDocument(), writer);
240    } else {
241      eventWriter.add(eventFactory.createSpace(""));
242    }
243
244  }
245
246  @SuppressWarnings("null")
247  @Override
248  public Stream<Node> getNodesAsStream() {
249    return Stream.concat(Stream.of(getDocument()),
250        StreamSupport.stream(getDocument().getDescendants().spliterator(), false));
251  }
252
253  @Override
254  @NonNull
255  public List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts() {
256    return getInserts(insert -> true);
257  }
258
259  /**
260   * Retrieve all insert statements that are contained within this markup text
261   * that match the provided filter.
262   *
263   * @param filter
264   *          a filter used to identify matching insert statements
265   * @return the matching insert statements
266   */
267  @Override
268  @NonNull
269  public List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts(@NonNull Predicate<InsertAnchorNode> filter) {
270    InsertAnchorExtension.InsertVisitor visitor = new InsertAnchorExtension.InsertVisitor(filter);
271    visitor.visitChildren(getDocument());
272    return visitor.getInserts();
273  }
274
275  @Override
276  public String toString() {
277    return AstCollectingVisitor.asString(getDocument());
278  }
279}
